agentDescription: Jest testing patterns and mocking. Use this when task intent aligns with tags: testing, jest. Use this construction when an agent task matches jest testing workflows and the team needs a repeatable, typed analysis contract. It cannot replace full runtime verification and does not guarantee correctness outside the provided input and capability constraints.
